## Open source courses

One of the pionering website that regularly shares LLM related open courses with experts is called the [Deeplearning.ai](https://www.deeplearning.ai/short-courses/). They have a list of good courses to deiv in, including but not limited to;

-   ChatGPT Prompt Engineering for Developers:

    -   Learn prompt engineering best practices for application development
    -   Discover new ways to use LLMs, including how to build your own chatbot
    -   Gain hands-on practice writing and iterating on prompts using the OpenAI API

-   Building Systems with the ChatGPT API

-   LangChain: Chat with Your Data

-   Finetuning Large Language Models

-   Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback

-   Quality and Safety for LLM Applications
